title: Il cinema a Bologna: Renzo Renzi e la Columbus film
other_title_information: Official title screen: 'Il cinema a Bologna – Renzo Renzi e la Columbus film'
current_location: Renzo Renzi Library, Cineteca di Bologna
description: Video interview with Renzo Renzi discussing his work and the history of Columbus Film, produced by the Cineteca di Bologna.
notes: Interview recorded in VHS format; director and interviewer are not credited.
